TopicTitle: LazTec Businessjet - classy short range jet for 7 Kerbals

Articles.Content:
hello folks, it's been a long time sinced i published a craft here. This little cutie is my entry for the [URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/139563-Regional-airliner-challenge"]"Regional airliner challenge"[/URL]. It's a small little businessjet based on teh real life Learjet. It can carry a total of 7 Kerbals by a maxspeed of 250 m/s or mach 0.7 at sealevel.


download:
-> [URL="http://www./download/k1d9zh4s163j08k/LazTec++Businessjet.craft"]LazTec Businessjet[/URL] <-


Actiongroups:
1 - Flaps
2 - Airbrakes (linked together with wheelbrakes, Key B)
3 - Ladder


Pictures:
[imgur]GX0Kc[/imgur]
Very nice. Simple, functional, clean lines.
